Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to tax exemption for certain insecticides
Summary: Establishes a tax exemption for insecticides used in the treatment and eradication of the emerald ash borer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the sale of certain insecticides from state sales and use taxes
